original_title: Defenders of the Earth Movie: Prince of Kro-Tan
overview: Kro-Tan overtakes his father only to fall prey to his own greediness. Kro-Tan, Ming's son, wants to take over his father's kingdom. He pays a visit to Zorelda, an old ugly witch with magical powers and asks for her support. Zorelda complies and gives Kro-Tan three powers: teleportation, telekenesis and disguise.
title: Defenders of the Earth Movie: Prince of Kro-Tan
